projects.title: Dual-tone multi-frequency signaling (DTFM)
projects.long_title: Undergraduate Signal Course, Department of Computer engineering, IUST, Tehran, Iran, May, 2019
projects.description: Developed a program (in Python), using the NumPy and FFT library to detect the voice-frequency band over telephone lines.

projects.title: Car License Plate Recognition
projects.long_title: Undergraduate Artificial Intelligent Course, Department of Computer engineering, IUST, Tehran, Iran, January - February, 2018
projects.description: Developed a program, using the CNN Neural Network to detect the Car License Plate.

projects.title: Tehran Car
projects.long_title: Undergraduate Software engineering Course, Department of Computer engineering, IUST, Tehran, Iran, September - February, 2018
projects.description: Team lead developer and head of Front-end development in the creation of a Car Rental Website, using the HTML5/CSS/JS for Front-end and Django for Back-end.

projects.title: Teachant
projects.long_title: Undergraduate Analysis and design of systems Course, Department of Computer engineering, IUST, Tehran, Iran, March - June, 2018
projects.description: Team lead developer and head of Front-end development in the creation of Requesting a Tutor Website, using the HTML5/CSS/JS/ for Front-end and Django for Back-end

projects.title: Stronghold (Video game)
projects.long_title: Undergraduate Advance Programming Course, Department of Computer engineering, IUST, Tehran, Iran, May, 2017
projects.description: Developed a shortest-based routing algorithm in a Strategy game, using an A*algorithm, tasks were prioritized based on proximity to the location.
